content.text: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch pie pan.
2) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large skillet"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium-high heat"@36:52 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft.
4) Stir in spinach and continue cooking until excess moisture has evaporated.
5) In a large bowl, combine eggs, cheese, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "eggs"@28:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cheese"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@42:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pepper"@51:57 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Add spinach mixture and stir to blend.
8) Bake in preheated oven until eggs have set, about 30 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "preheated oven"@11:25 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until eggs have set"@26:45 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "30 minutes"@53:63 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "cool"@-1:-1 / AC
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "10 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-9-0 "before serving"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
